Name: Big NEON Tower VS Tiny Square
About the game: New Tower. Old Enemy. Ride the vaporwaves in the 3rd instalment of the Big Tower Tiny Square series! Inspired by 90s arcades, the Big NEON Tower is one giant level broken up into large single-screen sections. Each obstacle has been meticulously placed. Each section devilishly designed. It will take patience and skill to navigate the maze-like tower. Precision is key to success! This 3rd instalment of the Big Tower Tiny Square series includes: Story Mode ( ~ 2 hours of content) Steam Achievements Controller Support Rad 90s Aesthetic Kickass Soundtrack
